    • wrapAsKeyValue

      public static final <K,​ V> HashEqualator<KeyValue<K,​V>> wrapAsKeyValue​(HashEqualator<? super K> hashEqualator)
      Wrappers the passed HashEqualator instance as a KeyValue HashEqualator instance, using the KeyValue instance's key as the hash element.
      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type
      V - the value type
      Parameters:
      hashEqualator - single element HashEqualator instance to be wrapped.
      Returns:
      the passed instance as a KeyValue HashEqualator instance.
